duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to acquire new customers and drive revenue growth.
Lead a team of sales representatives, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Maintain customer relationships and client retention through effective communication and personalized service.
Generate leads through prospecting, networking, and innovative lead generation strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of sales activities, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
